representation_information.name: ESRI Shapefile
representation_information.description: The Shapefile format stores non-topological geometry and attribute information for the spatial features in a data set. The geometry for a feature is stored as a shape comprising a set of vector coordinates. Shapefiles can support point, line, and area features.

extras.field: shp, shx, dbf, sbn, sbx, atx, fbn, fbx, ain, aih, ixs, mxs, prj, xml, cpg

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
